IDelegationManager","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes","name":"_terms","type":"bytes"}],"name":"getTermsInfo","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"recipient_","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount_","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"pure","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"The redeemer must include an allowance delegation when executing the payment. The payment, made in native tokens, is processed during the execution of the allowance delegation to ensure that the payment conditions set by the terms are met.When constructing the leaf allowance delegation, the use of `ArgsEqualityCheckEnforcer` is mandatory placed as the first caveat to prevent front-running attacks. This ensures that the execution arguments (delegationHash and redeemer) match exactly, protecting the delegation.It is recommended to combine the allowance delegation with the `NativeTokenTransferAmountEnforcer` to ensure the correct token transfer amount.This enforcer operates only in default execution mode.","kind":"dev","methods":{"afterAllHook(bytes,bytes,bytes32,bytes,bytes32,address,address)":{"params":{"_args":"Encoded arguments containing the allowance delegation chain for the payment.","_delegationHash":"The hash of the delegation.","_delegator":"The address of the delegator.","_mode":"The execution mode. params._args: Encoded arguments containing the allowance delegation chain for the payment.
params._mode: The execution mode. (Must be Default execType)
params._redeemer: The address that is redeeming the delegation.
params._terms: Encoded 52 packed bytes where: the first 20 bytes are the address of the recipient, the next 32 bytes are the amount to charge for the delegation.

afterHook(bytes,bytes,bytes32,bytes,byte.details: This function MUST revert if the conditions are not met.

params._args: An optional input parameter set by the redeemer at time of invocation.
params._mode: The mode of execution for the executionCalldata.
params._redeemer: The address that is redeeming the delegation.
params._terms: The terms to enforce set by the delegator.

beforeAllHook(bytes,bytes,bytes32,bytes,.details: This function MUST revert if the conditions are not met.

params._args: An optional input parameter set by the redeemer at time of invocation.
params._mode: The mode of execution for the executionCalldata.
params._redeemer: The address that is redeeming the delegation.
params._terms: The terms to enforce set by the delegator.

beforeHook(bytes,bytes,bytes32,bytes,byt.details: This function MUST revert if the conditions are not met.

params._args: An optional input parameter set by the redeemer at time of invocation.
params._mode: The mode of execution for the executionCalldata.
params._redeemer: The address that is redeeming the delegation.
params._terms: The terms to enforce set by the delegator.
Encoded 52 packed bytes where: the first 20 bytes are the address of the recipient, the next 32 bytes are the amount to charge for the delegation.

returns.amount_: The native token amount that must be paid.
returns.recipient_: The recipient that receives the payment.

afterAllHook(bytes,bytes,bytes32,bytes,b.notice: Enforces the conditions that should hold after a transaction is performed.

afterHook(bytes,bytes,bytes32,bytes,byte.notice: Enforces conditions after the execution tied to a specific delegation in the redemption process.

beforeAllHook(bytes,bytes,bytes32,bytes,.notice: Enforces conditions before any actions in a batch redemption process begin.

beforeHook(bytes,bytes,bytes32,bytes,byt.notice: Enforces conditions before the execution tied to a specific delegation in the redemption process.

getTermsInfo(bytes).notice: Decodes the terms used in this CaveatEnforcer.
